note:
F1 - Turn on/off the slow motion switch. Use the up/down cursors to change
     the speed 

F2 - Turn on/off the trace mode. Everytime "T" is pressed you advance a step 

F3 - Change to 50/60 Hz

F4 - Stop diskdrive (Only for the Philips MSX2)

F5 - Turn off music - Pressing CTRL+F5 switches off music for good

F6 - Save picture to cheatmaster specially formatted disk
     
   - CTRL+Cursor keys will centre the screen

   - Use the numbers 1 to 4 to see the different graphic screens but remember
     to select the correct screen when going back to the game

CAPS - With the CAPS key you can turn on/off the R800 speed

KANA - With the KANA key you can give a searchstring. If it is HEX then press
       the "$" key before the numbers. Now press CLR/HOME. Now return to the
       game and when the number is different then install it with the KANA
       key and press SELECT. If no cheat address is found try again a little
       later again using the SELECT key.

       To select a cheat address press TAB. 

       To alter the number on the cheat address press DEL (-1)
       """""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""" INS (+1)
       """""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""" CTRL+INS (+10)
       """""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""""" CTRL+DEL (-10)

PRINTING - Press CTRL+P to print out all the cheat address's found
